Class FileServerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • com.rmi.FileServerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileServer, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote
    public class FileServerImpl
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements FileServer
    File Server Implementation class

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Starts File Server Implementation. It can take 1 or 3 arguments.
        Parameters:
        args - If only one arguments is provided it checks server name from configuration file and starts with corresponding values. If 3 arguments are provided they are intended as ServerRoot, ServerIP, ServerPort
